html: 7.12.17  1:36 am   Why do you answer off the wall questions that are constructed on purposes just to get a reaction or agitated response from you and not answer normal questions like mine?
7.12.17  1:13 am   "i'm assuming you probably didn't expect 'history of japan' to go viral" yeah right. this is gotta be bullshit, right? you probably expected a large response.

7.12.17  12:10 am   what music artist is your favorite

7.12.17  12:08 am   how do i incorporate more mischief into my harmony singing?? i can sing good harmonies but they're not great. it always seems like they're just nice and not like spirit-filled. i think i am using my ears and spirit but i feel like i'm blocked from getting to the really good stuff. on second thought this applies to all my musical pursuits, what can i do? have you ever felt like this?
7.12.17  12:03 am   will there ever be a return of the bill wurtz band?
7.11.17  11:52 pm   were you surprised at the jokes ppl latched onto in hotewig? or do u not really care?
7.11.17  11:31 pm   Hey Bill. I've been a fan of your work since history of Japan and I was wondering if you were going to resume your short fun vids or plan on doing another documentary.

7.11.17  10:38 pm   how did you avoid second-product syndrome when making "history of the entire world"?

     i'm assuming you probably didn't expect "history of japan" to go viral, and "history of the entire world" is so similar to japan in terms of structure and humor and overall feeling. both videos are obviously incredibly similar, and yet so different from each other. how did you create a spiritual sequel to japan without essentially making the same video?

7.11.17  5:50 pm   Do you usually prefer to use universal/cultural symbols,

     do you like to develop your own,

     or what balance between?

7.11.17  5:48 pm   this isn't a question but I'm a big fan and I think your work is interesting and thought provoking. Okay kind of a question: doesn't it get tiring when people are constantly telling you "you really ought to do X to be more successful"??

     I bet it does. You shouldn't listen to those people. You got here without their advice, and you'll keep going without it too.
